Record your own gourmet profile
and connect with like-minded foodies.

login.title: To get started
login.subtitle: Please log in to record your taste data.

validation.tooLong: Nickname must be 30 characters or less.
validation.invalid: Only English letters, numbers, and underscores (_) are allowed.

profileSetup.title: Setup your profile
profileSetup.subtitle: Please provide your profile image and a short bio

quiz.analyzingSub: Saving your taste map to our database.

validation.invalid: Only letters, numbers, periods (.), hyphens (-), and underscores (_) are allowed.

visibility.label: Ranking Visibility
visibility.description: Your ranking will be visible up to the specified limit.

questions.1: I prefer foods with very strong aromas and flavors.
questions.2: I tend to use salt, pepper, or herbs generously.
questions.3: I like clear and intense flavors rather than subtle ones.
questions.4: I enjoy sour flavors or the tanginess of vinegar.
questions.5: I often look for foods with lemon juice or dressings.
questions.6: I like desserts with a hint of fruit acidity.
questions.7: I like heavy flavors with lots of butter or cream.
questions.8: I enjoy the savory richness of meat fat.
questions.9: I don't get tired of eating cheese or oily foods.
questions.10: I am not hesitant to try new ingredients or dishes I've never had before.
questions.11: I enjoy trying fusion cuisine or unique food combinations.
questions.12: I look for new restaurants rather than just going to places I've been.
questions.13: I eat spicy food well and feel it relieves my stress.
questions.14: I often want to add chili or hot sauce to most of my food.
questions.15: I prefer heat that is intense enough to make my tongue tingle.
questions.16: I always make sure to have a sweet dessert after a meal.
questions.17: I really like the harmony of 'sweet and salty' flavors.
questions.18: I enjoy the sweet flavors of sugar or syrup in my food.
questions.19: I value the deep and savory umami of soup dishes.
questions.20: I like deep flavors from mushrooms, kelp, or aged cheese.
questions.21: I prefer the taste of savory seasonings or fermented foods.
